content:
In this dataset, people are asked to rate the sentiment of text. The possible ratings are as follows: Very negative (-2), somewhat negative (-1), neutral (0), somewhat positive (1), very positive (2).

Correct Examples:
Example 1:
Text: @AquaAHH #ilove everything old school!
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 2:
Text: @shaysmom I got teriyaki chix ready for the fire!  Shall I bring it up now? and 8 hour old malasadas for dessert.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 3:
Text: I was just informed my son is too old to be my 'baby boy'
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 4:
Text: I miss my old Japanese Drama/boy band loving days. I'm slowly getting back into the stream. Ahhh Arashi is my Asian Backstreet Boys
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 5:
Text: has had a rough time, bel had chickenpox and poor honey my 9yr old bunny had to be put down. really really sad right now
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 6:
Text: @monicasalas ohhhh definitely agreed  Hugh Jackman as well. sexy older men!
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 7:
Text: oh good, as I'm moving my things to the new machine I'm sent back to the old one for the morning.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 8:
Text: @postulantk I have to give him back because he can't be around my older one yet. Hasn't had the Feline Leukemia test.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 9:
Text: What's happened to my picture? Can't seem to upload new one and old one has disappeared
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 10:
Text: Daughter and I are both sick. Her first cold at 4 months old.  The big green snot-sucker thing didn't go over so well. I don't blame her.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 11:
Text: back from collecting youngest son, time for #cuppa then back out at 4pm to get oldest from athletics, then hubby taking them snowboarding
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 12:
Text: Because ur an old man man my friend.  lol Just kidding.......
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 13:
Text: @mikelr75 Oh yes, Cedric. Too bad he died. The good ones always die young. No, Gregg watched it happily, smile on face. I was impressed!
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 14:
Text: Waning - Green Day <3 Love the oldies.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 15:
Text: @nateflynn aww I still watch disney, nick and cartoon network lol  makes me feel better that you're older than me and you still watch it
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 16:
Text: Have a blessed time of worship today! We're having a graduation party after church for a young man who has graduated from high school.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 17:
Text: @DurbinDigital That's what old markers are best for: subtle shading and blending.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 18:
Text: @marks_voice ah the old isdn/adsl story, looking forward to Bob explaining in 140 characters  Or he could just say "you can't"!!
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 19:
Text: @balkanbeat No, a-ha is unfortunatelly from Norway. We have a big family happening and therefore we need some old hits
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 20:
Text: Awesome. They removed @ryanstar's old stuff from German Itunes which probably means his new stuff won't be added anytime soon.
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 21:
Text: @DooneyStudio  and crazy white girls drive really old BMW's
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 22:
Text: @TomFelton OMG your new pic is sooo cute!!  How old is it?
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 23:
Text: 2 parties tonight & sleeep over with the most amazing 9 year old I know, my cousin Nasia Marie
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 24:
Text: I don't wannnnna go to work tomorrow.   Anyone know any filthy-rich old men looking for someone to take care of?? Lol
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 25:
Text: @stresscase Also, should definitely date a muscian. Maybe one older than 16 but yeah! Someone should write me a song too!
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 26:
Text: Givin my cuzzin my old size 5 jeans  *sigh*
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 27:
Text: @ash1111 I do tend to gravitate towards old school everything ...  Unless someone shoves a new song in my face I like.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 28:
Text: Tweeting from my new home... I now live in @kelliesimpson's old room... So not woot for me
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 29:
Text: @pcornqueen ohhhh that us sad, he was not that old
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 30:
Text: Chatting with old friends, then off to dinner
Annotation from annotator: 4

Target Example:
Text: Going to bed before midnight so often lately makes me feel too old.
Annotation from annotator:
Your output should be a single integer corresponding to the label.
